pkgmetadata.longdescription: # asyncify[![Wheel](https://img.shields.io/pypi/wheel/asyncify.svg)](https://img.shields.io/pypi/wheel/asyncify.svg)[![Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/asyncify.svg)](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/asyncify.svg)[![py_versions](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/asyncify.svg)](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/asyncify.svg)[![Code style: black](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)](https://github.com/psf/black)**TLDR:** Sync 2 Async decorator**Install:** `pip install asyncify`**Usage:**```pythonimport asyncify# ORfrom asyncify import asyncifyfrom asyncify import run # asyncio.run polyfill for python36def add(a, b): return a + bassert add(1, 2) == 3@asyncifydef add_async(a, b): return a + bres = await add_async(1, 2)assert res == 3```
